projects.title: Chronicle Log
projects.subtitle: Knowledge sanctuary with memory-keyed access logic
projects.concept: A radical departure from conventional digital storage. Chronicle Log replaces visual navigation with a 'Memory-Locked' gateway, where data remains invisible until retrieved via exact taxonomic keys. It is a system designed for absolute privacy, ensuring that information is protected solely by the user’s cognitive recall.

projects.title: Pixelated
projects.subtitle: A technical journal of C++ evolution and game systems
projects.concept: A chronological archive documenting the transition from high-level abstractions to low-level mastery. Pixelated serves as a systematic record of deciphering ECS architectures and render loops, preserving the friction of the learning process as a foundational resource for future system development.

projects.title: Recrafted
projects.subtitle: Behavioral simulation of academic pressure and imposter syndrome
projects.concept: A raw, interactive exploration of psychological weight within an academic environment. Built as a terminal-based narrative engine, Recrafted utilizes complex decision branching to simulate the 'logic of emotion.' By stripping away visual distractions, it forces players to navigate the internal dilemmas that define self-worth.

projects.title: RAiVFY
projects.subtitle: Low-level music engine built on custom data structures
projects.concept: A deep dive into fundamental computer science, bypassing standard libraries to implement raw Data Structures. From Doubly Linked Lists for playlist management to Stack-based 'Undo' operations, this project demonstrates the rigorous logic required to manage data flow efficiently within memory-constrained environments.

projects.title: TeraHub
projects.subtitle: Database-driven architecture for digital asset commerce
projects.concept: A functional exploration of the relationship between relational databases and user interfaces. TeraHub serves as a prototype for gaming marketplaces, demonstrating the core logic of CRUD operations and inventory management using PHP and MySQL without the abstraction of modern frameworks.

projects.title: Nadi Bumi
projects.subtitle: A real-time disaster information and education portal
projects.concept: Bridging the gap between raw seismic data and public awareness. Nadi Bumi is an educational platform that integrates real-time data from the BMKG API to provide up-to-date disaster alerts. Built with PHP, the project focuses on transforming complex geological data into an accessible interface, serving as a critical information hub for natural disaster preparedness.
